QuestData.Title: Inherit the Earth
QuestData.Description: As you know, $n, I'm getting along in my years. One can't stay a spry young pandaren forever, you know.$B$BI'm looking for someone to take over my duties here at the Tillers Union, and I can't think of a better person than Farmer Yoon.$B$BHe's got a good deal to learn, but he's got a good head on his shoulders and most importantly, a generous heart.$B$BDo you think he'd be interested?

Objectives.Objective: Ask Farmer Yoon to join the Tillers council
